elements.name: FÃ¼hren Sie die Genitiv-Probe durch:
elements.title: Carry out the genitive test:

elements.name: Frage 2
elements.title: What's the best thing* that could happen to you today?
elements.correctAnswer: What is the best of the best that could happen to you today?

elements.name: panel2
elements.title: Carry out the genitive test:

elements.name: question13
elements.title: For me, time is the most precious thing* in life.
elements.correctAnswer: For me, time is the most precious thing that is really important in life.

elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Carry out the genitive test:

elements.name: question1
elements.title: For him, going shopping at Jack & Jones is the greatest thing*.
elements.correctAnswer: For him, shopping at Jack & Jones is the greatest of the greatest.

elements.name: panel3
elements.title: Carry out the genitive test:

elements.name: question25
elements.title: Shopping* at the click of a mouse can quickly become a debt trap.
elements.correctAnswer: Shopping for young people at the click of a mouse can quickly become a debt trap.

elements.name: panel4
elements.title: Carry out the genitive test:

elements.name: question36
elements.title: Debt advisors can help avert the worst* in the event of financial difficulties*.
elements.correctAnswer: Debt advisors can help to avert the worst of the worst if a young person has financial difficulties.

elements.name: panel5
elements.title: Carry out the genitive test:

elements.name: question47
elements.title: Fair shopping* often has its price.
elements.correctAnswer: Fair shopping for everyday items often comes at a price.

elements.name: panel6
elements.title: Carry out the genitive test:

elements.name: question58
elements.title: Capacity* is regulated by law in Switzerland*.
elements.correctAnswer: In Switzerland, a person's capacity for judgment is regulated by law.

elements.name: panel7
elements.title: Carry out the genitive test. Attention: The nominalization must be recognized here.

elements.name: question69
elements.title: She decided this with a clarity that amazed us.
elements.correctAnswer: She decided this with a clarity of determination that astounded us.

elements.name: panel8
elements.title: Carry out the genitive test. Attention: The nominalization must be recognized here.

elements.name: question80
elements.title: It would probably be the most responsible thing to do without cheap goods completely.
elements.correctAnswer: It would probably be the most responsible purchasing behavior of all to completely avoid cheap goods on the clothing market.

elements.name: panel9
elements.title: Carry out the genitive test. Attention: The nominalization must be recognized here.

elements.name: question91
elements.title: I would like to be able to afford something luxurious.
elements.correctAnswer: I would like to be able to afford something luxurious in a class of its own.
